scenario_text.value: Looks like we’d better bail you out, yeah?
Kaito, Dracumon! Aoi and Labramon, too!

Seeing those awful visions over and over made
my head spin, I admit, but...

This is the path I’ve chosen... I’m not going
to back down or whine about it now!
Let’s go too, Kaito. You pumped for this?

You know it. Someone pisses me off, you
better believe I’m gonna get some payback!

(What? More enemies?! We’re gonna have to
regroup...)
